Organifi: Hey , this is Vivian. I noticed you subscribed recently but haven't purchased yet.

Some people have questions before trying Organifi. Is there anything you'd like to ask us?

https://organifi.attn.tv/a0wV6Wdyd4iD
Hi Vivian, hope you had a nice weekend.  Any progress with the cannister?  I see last order was $260 and I take the Green Juice and Pure daily.

Organifi: Thank you! I hope you had a nice one, too! I'm afraid I haven't heard from the team yet. Let me follow up on this, and I'll be in touch once I get an update. Alternatively, you can email us directly at support@organifi.com. Our team is happy to help!
Thanks, Vivian.  I'll trust you to handle.  Looking to receive the cannister.  Happy to make a product purchase as needed.  Plmk . . . .
Organifi: My pleasure! Have a great day and if you have any questions, feel free to send me a text. I'll be in touch!
Organifi: Get a FREE 30-day supply of Organifi Shilajit Gummies w/ any 3 items organifi.attn.tv/aYb8sJ1fwbJG
Organifi: hi there! can you please let us know which canister you're referring to? I see an order placed under your account from Dec 19 which included a free ceramic container.
Right, that's the one.  I have one for my Green Juice and I'd like another for my Pure, both of which I take every day.
Organifi: Thank you! Let me get back with this info, and I'll keep you posted.
Hi Vivian, hope all is well, any luck with the canister?
Organifi: I'm sorry to keep you waiting. Unfortunately, I haven't heard back from the team yet. Rest assured I'll shoot you a text as soon as I have an update!
Organifi: Still moving! Any 3 products gets you a FREE 30-day supply of Organifi Shilajit Gummies, plus you get free shipping on orders over $150 organifi.attn.tv/a0ns_pP8mm-y
Thanks, Vivian.  I'm willing to purchase three products to get the canister rather than the gummies . . . .
Organifi: I understand. Unfortunately, I'm still waiting for an update from my team. Rest assured, I'll let you know once I hear back from them. We appreciate your patience.
Happy Friday, Vivian!  Can we resolve the canister today please?  I've been a loyal customer for years and there are obviously a lot of other supplements I could try.  Please let's close this out.

Organifi: Thank you for being a loyal customer! And I'm sorry for the delayed response from the team. As soon as I get the information I will send you a message right away. We try our best to resolve any concerns/issues our customers might have as quickly as possible, so thank you for your patience thus far.
Organifi: Green Juice: Save over $71 and get free shipping on this bundle of 3 organifi.attn.tv/alxgtOZaiyje
Today?
Organifi: Go ahead and make a purchase and reach out with the ordr number so we can add the ceramix container as a courtesy,
Thank you, Vivian, just send to you?
Hi Vivian, thanks for the help with the canister.  Are you online today to take an order number so we can close this out?
Organifi: You're welcome! Yes, I'm here. I'll wait for the order number.
Hi Vivian, the order number is:  GZW0WLMD8Three bags of Pure going to Eric GrannonPlease confirmation addition of ceramix canister as a courtesy.  Thank you!
Organifi: Thanks so much! I'll send this over to the team and I'll ge back to you again. ğŸ˜Š
Hi Vivian, we all set?
Organifi: Yes, we're all set for now. I've already forwarded your concern to our support team, and rest assured, I'll keep you updated as soon as I hear back from them.
Organifi: Save 30% on Organifi's Mood-enhancing Happy Drops gummies! organifi.attn.tv/amVyFQguPsNE
Good morning, Vivian, I received this automated text.  Can we make sure the canister ships with my order per your message?  Will that go out today?
Organifi: Got it! I actually haven't heard back from the team yet, but I already sent another follow-up. As soon as I hear back, I'll let you know!
Hi Vivian, hope all is well.  I received an e-mail that the order has shipped but I don't see the canister referenced.  Please confirm that the canister will arrive with the order.  Kind regards,
Organifi: I'm sorry to keep you waiting. Unfortunately, I haven't heard back from the team yet. Rest assured I'll shoot you a text as soon as I have an update!

Vivian, thanks for the response but I placed the order at the company's direction that the order would have the canister included.  If we cannot get confirmation today, I prefer to cancel the order for a full refund.  I have more product than I need right now.  Plmk . . . .
Organifi: I completely understand. Rest assured, I will get back to you the second the team replies. Thank you for your patience, and have a good day for now.
Organifi: Boost your energy naturally with our fan-favorite Organifi Red Juice bundle! Perfect for a caffeine-free pick-me-up. Save 30% organifi.attn.tv/a2v-x8nzV7zZ
Hi Vivian, can we resolve today?

Organifi: I'm so sorry, I haven't heard back from the team just yet. I'll keep you updated as soon as I do. Alternatively, you can email us directly at support@organifi.com or give us a call at 1-760-487-8587 Our team is happy to help! Please be sure to check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there.
What would I e-mail?  Isn't the representation from you that the canister would be added to my order a solution that came from your team?
Organifi: It's alright, no worries about it. I'll just wait for my team's response. I'll be sure to update you the moment I hear back.

send_to_cs: If escalated do NOT send to CS
escalate: ESC if a cx wants to purchase an out of stock item
ESC if cx want someone from the cs team to call them directly
ESC when a cx asks for a call back
ESC if uncertain about refills or product specific questions
ESC if cx has issues registering
ESC if cx asks for help putting through an order
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't use too many exclamation points
Use more formal language such as "Hello" instead of "Hey"
Avoid responding to anything related to politics
dos_and_donts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links
Don't ever release information on personnel related to the company
Don't share any authorized retailers, only boutiques
Don't ask cx to leave product reviews as they don't collect them
drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page

Please send a photo of the item that you received as well.

I'll check email spam 
Do you from whom I received the email

send_to_cs: For any inquiries about the price changes, use the temp "Why has the price changed?"
For any inquiries about the wildfires in LA affecting shipping rerouthing, send to CS
tone: Be clear about the sales schedules and policies
Avoid conveying that we have a lot of sales or promotions
templates: If cx's ask when/how often do we have sales, use DHS shortcut
âœ  ğŸ…¿ï¸ You can mention free shipping for anything $75+
For price adjustment inquiries, use PAE shortcut
drive_to_purchase: Always suggest another option if what they want is out
Do not DTP before the start of a sale!

escalation_preferences: Order Issues: mispacks, defectives, lost packages
